body:
We've built and released our fourth betting Model in 2021; just in time to share **Australian Open Predictions**. 'You little beauty', as they say down here. This Model, developed by one of the sharpest sports betting data scientists in the industry, ingests dozens of tennis data sources to create probabilities for every tournament. From backyard ATP events to the Grand Slams. It distinguishes surfaces. So Rafa is going to have a different rating on clay than he is on the Australian Open hardcourt. We'll go into further details in the coming days, but let's stop wasting time and start reading the **Australian Open Predictions**. They'll populate every day of the tournament. - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Predictions** As you can see, we've just got the head to head proabilities today. We'll expand the basic UX in the coming days. And then by the end of the tournament, we should have some pretty sexy outputs. For now, we'll populate the picks, and below each table will be some value betting options that stand out.
- - - ## **Mens Daily Tennis Betting Tips** Some juicy bets today/tonight. We can't wait for Kyrgios vs Thiem. Will be explosive and the Model thinks the polarizing local should be +182 ($2.82), not +310 ($4.10). The Model is also taking on Zverev again and thinks the Djoker is too short against the young American. * **Adrian Mannarino** vs Alexander Zverev (+7.5) * **Pedro Martinez Portero** vs Dusan Lajovic * **Marton Fucsovics** vs Milos Raonic (+6.5) * **Nick Kyrgios** vs Dominic Thiem (LFG) * **Taylor Harry Fritz** vs Novak Djokovic vs (Model $14 vs Market $21, or take +9.5) - - -
Want the **best odds on tennis**? **Join the world's biggest sportsbook.** **JOIN BET365. NOW.**
- - - ## **Australian Open Womens Predictions** Here's the head to heads, get the analysis below.
- - - ## **Womens Daily Tennis Betting Tips** Love the Halep bet the Model has found. World number two at only -3.5. And happy to take on Grand Slam champions Muguruza and Williams at big lines. Zarina Diyas was cash money for us last start. * **Aryna Sabalenka** vs Ann Li (-4.5) * **Zarina Diyas** vs Garbine Muguruza (+6.5) * **Anastasia Potapova** vs Serena Williams (+6.5) * **Simona Halep** vs Veronika Kudermetova (-3.5) - - - ## **Australian Open Mens Odds** We've also got the futures markets, showing you live probabilities of each market. Here's the mens: - - - ## **Australian Open Womens Odds** - - - #### **Want tennis predictions all year? Sign up for the Wednesday email.** #### **We promise it's worth your time.**
